alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Bleckley; Crawford; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Taylor; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:27PM EDT until June 25 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laurens County in central Georgia... Northwestern Dodge County in central Georgia... Southeastern Bibb County in central Georgia... Houston County in central Georgia... Southern Wilkinson County in central Georgia... Macon County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Pulaski County in central Georgia... Twiggs County in central Georgia... Northern Dooly County in central Georgia... Bleckley County in central Georgia... Peach County in central Georgia... Southeastern Crawford County in central Georgia... Central Taylor County in west central Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 826 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tuckers Crossroad to Sand Bed to Garden Valley, moving south at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dublin, Perry, Fort Valley, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Butler, Oglethorpe, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Unadilla, Montezuma, Chester, Marshallville, Reynolds, Dexter, Dudley and Byromville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Bleckley; Crawford; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Taylor; Twiggs; Wilkinson
